column4: I want to install linux completely on a 10 GB partition. But the partition table is allowing me to only set it as swap or root directory.
Hoew do i put both into that 10 gb partition?
what do you mean by "the partition table allows only to.."?
you need both: an ext3 partition mounted at / and a swap partition. btw: the ubuntu-installer can do that for you except in difficult cases
